channel.title: Mack and Mike in the morning
channel.itunes:author: Mack and Mike
channel.itunes:summary: Mack and Mike talk about life, tech, and the tech lifestyle.
channel.description: Mack and Mike talk about life, tech, and the tech lifestyle.

item.title: Episode 0: The New Experience Initiative (NIN)
item.itunes:summary: Mack and Mike talk about their new experience initiative.
item.description: Mack and Mike talk about their new experience initiative.
item.itunes:author: Mack and Mike

item.title: Episode 1: Running for office and running a marathon
item.itunes:summary: Mack and Mike weigh in on Cuomo vs Nixon and their thoughts on running. Also Mike reviews Airpods.
item.description: Mack and Mike weigh in on Cuomo vs Nixon and their thoughts on running. Also Mike reviews Airpods.
item.itunes:author: Mack and Mike

item.title: Episode 2: Serious life business
item.itunes:summary: First, Mack and Mike talk about Mack's life as a popular vlogger and how he tries to maintain control over his life narrative. Then, they delve into how human memories, technology, and the New Experience Initiative (NIN) are altering their lives and decisions. They also get a new theme song and sponsor.
item.description: First, Mack and Mike talk about Mack's life as a popular vlogger and how he tries to maintain control over his life narrative. Then, they delve into how human memories, technology, and the New Experience Initiative (NIN) are altering their lives and decisions. They also get a new theme song and sponsor.
item.itunes:author: Mack and Mike

item.title: Episode 3: Remember words a lot
item.itunes:summary: Mack and Mike talk about how language affects thought patterns, the purpose of grammar, the role of AI in writing and sports.
item.description: Mack and Mike talk about how language affects thought patterns, the purpose of grammar, the role of AI in writing and sports.
item.itunes:author: Mack and Mike

item.title: Episode 4: Good habits, bad habits
item.itunes:summary: Mack and Mike discuss the best season of The Office (US). Mike tells Mack about his morning routine. Finally they wonder if habits are fundamentally at odds with NIN.
item.description: Mack and Mike discuss the best season of The Office (US). Mike tells Mack about his morning routine. Finally they wonder if habits are fundamentally at odds with NIN.
item.itunes:author: Mack and Mike
